name: Spirited Suites
description:
Spirited Suites was developed by Team Canned Gluten as a senior project at the College for Creative Studies in Detroit, Michigan. It was developed using the Unity Engine over a span of around 6 months.

WHO MADE THIS?

BRENDAN ROARTY - Code, Technical Artist

DILLAN MURILLO - Animation, Trailer

MARISSA BOROWSKI- 3D Artist, Writer

MADS PAPPAS - Concept Artist, 2D Artist, Writer

SARAH KOSCO - 3D Artist, Level Design

JAMES CANNIZZARO - 3D Artist, Level Design, Rigging

THOMAS HAMILTON - 3D Artist, Level Design, Rigging

CONTROLS

(Keyboard and Controller support provided)

WASD to move

MOVE MOUSE to turn camera

LEFT MOUSE to overhead grab

RIGHT MOUSE to leg grab

ESCAPE to open menu

SPACE BAR to jump or confirm in menu

R to restart a level
